General.Name: MyTech Group Bhd
General.Description: MyTech Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture of precision springs in Malaysia and Laos. It operates through Manufacturing and Others segments. The company's precision springs are used in various industries, such as electrical, electronics, automotive, general household, and consumer products. It also engages in the provision of financing and insurance agency services, renting of properties, and provision of management services. The company was formerly known as Widetech (Malaysia) Berhad and changed its name to MyTech Group Berhad in November 2021. MyTech Group Berhad was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
